Detailed Description

This class lets a sound listener (ie. the SoundFactory) track a given camera in Ogre3D. The position and orientation of the listener will be updated to match the camera whenever the camera is moved.

void Mangle::Sound::OgreListenerMover::cameraPreRenderScene ( Ogre::Camera *  cam  )  [inline, private]

From Camera::Listener. This is called once per frame. Unfortunately, Ogre doesn't allow us to be notified only when the camera itself has moved, so we must poll every frame.

void Mangle::Sound::OgreListenerMover::followCamera ( Ogre::Camera *  cam  )  [inline]

Follow a camera. WARNING: This will OVERRIDE any other MovableObject::Listener you may have attached to the camera.
